Flow.description: 06May25 | PAT | ESS-1739 | AddOn Quantity Validation Needed within Sub Plan Screen Flow

formulas.description:
Displays the list of allowed quantities for the selected product, if available.
If Quantities Validated is not selected, the value is blank.
If allowed quantities are not specified, the message “Any value up to the maximum” is shown.
Otherwise, it shows the actual allowed quantity values defined for the product.
formulas.name: Error_Message_Allowed_Quantities

formulas.description:
Displays the maximum quantity allowed for the selected product, if applicable.
If Quantities Validated is not selected, the value is blank.
If validated, it displays the Max Quantity Allowed value configured for the product.
formulas.name: Error_Message_Max_Quantity_Allowed

formulas.description:
Shows a message based on whether quantity settings are set for the product.
If Quantities Validated is true, it shows: "Please enter a valid quantity within the allowed range."
If false, it shows: "Quantity settings aren't set yet for this product. Please contact the ProCat team."
formulas.name: Error_Message_Quantity_Error_Guidance
formulas.expression: IF( {!Iterate_through_all_selected_records.Product__r.Quantities_Validated__c}, "Please enter a valid quantity within the allowed range.", "Quantity settings aren't set yet for this product. Please contact the ProCat team." )

formulas.description:
Validates that the entered quantity meets three criteria:
Quantities Validated Check – The product must have the Quantities Validated checkbox selected. If not checked, the formula will return FALSE regardless of the other conditions.
Allowed Quantities Check – The quantity must be listed in the product's Allowed Quantities field (a semicolon-separated list of valid values), or the field must be blank (indicating no restrictions).
Maximum Quantity Check – The quantity must be less than or equal to the product's Max Quantity Allowed value, or this field must be blank (indicating no upper limit).
formulas.name: Valid_Quantity

fields.name: Add_On_Quantity_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Invalid Quantity

The quantity you entered isn’t allowed for {!Iterate_through_all_selected_records.Product__r.Name}.

✅ Allowed Quantities: {!Error_Message_Allowed_Quantities}

🚫 Maximum Quantity Allowed: {!Error_Message_Max_Quantity_Allowed}

{!Error_Message_Quantity_Error_Guidance}

fields.name: warningmsg
fields.fieldText:
WARNING: - Add-on(s) listed below are part of Subscription Family but don't have Add-On pricing associated to them for Subscription Plan: {!subscriptionPlanName}.


Please contact Product Support to get Add-On pricing Added to Subscription Plan: {!subscriptionPlanName}.


﻿
